Troops.Name: Mortar
Troops.Description: Mortar is a tactical military unit with low firepower designed for medium-Range targets.

Troops.Name: Rocket Launcher
Troops.Description: A rocket launcher is a tactical military unit with high firepower designed for long-Range targets.

Troops.Name: Patrol
Troops.Description: Patrol is a tactical military unit with destructive power designed for close-Range targets.

Troops.Name: Special Forces
Troops.Description: Special Forces is a tactical military unit with medium to high destructive power designed for close-Range targets.
